entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING, La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:33 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 5:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: NW 36 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
